thread.title: Intertek snaps up PSI for $330m as it eyes US construction recovery
thread.title_full: Intertek snaps up PSI for $330m as it eyes US construction recovery

author: Alan Tovey
title: Intertek snaps up PSI for $330m as it eyes US construction recovery
text: Engineering Intertek snaps up PSI for $330m as it eyes US construction recovery Testing group Intertek buys US peer as it looks to grab a bigger slice of US construction market PSI gets about a quarter of its revenues from testing oil and gas pipelines for cracks Photo: Alamy By Alan Tovey , and Lauren Davidson 10:02AM BST 14 Oct 2015
